question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology sector and identify trends based on their financial performance.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology sector along with their financial metrics such as revenue and net income.
Retrieve social media engagement data from various platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube) for the identified technology companies.
Analyze the relationship between the social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) and financial performance metrics (revenue, net income).
Identify any trends or patterns in engagement data over time and relate these trends to changes in the companies' financial performance.
